meanings.definition: A person who is older than another.
meanings.sent1: The seniors at the retirement home enjoy playing bingo together.
meanings.sent2: The seniors in the community have a lot of wisdom to share.
meanings.sent3: The seniors at the park were having a friendly chat on the bench.
meanings.sent4: The seniors of the family tree hold the stories of generations past.
meanings.sent5: The seniors in the neighborhood always greet everyone with a smile.

meanings.definition: A student in the final year of high school or college.
meanings.sent1: The high school seniors are excited for graduation day.
meanings.sent2: College seniors often feel a mix of anticipation and nostalgia.
meanings.sent3: The seniors in the school play put on a hilarious comedy.
meanings.sent4: The seniors of the class are like the leaders of the student body.
meanings.sent5: The seniors in the yearbook committee are busy capturing memories.

meanings.definition: A person of higher rank or standing.
meanings.sent1: The seniors in the company have years of experience.
meanings.sent2: The military seniors lead by example and inspire others.
meanings.sent3: The seniors at the meeting shared valuable insights.
meanings.sent4: The seniors of the organization guide the team towards success.
meanings.sent5: The seniors in the community are respected for their contributions.
